isPublic.label: Icyumba cya Leta
isPublic.description: Ibyumba rusange birashobora gushakishwa nabandi bakoresha

allowGuestJoin.label: Emerera abashyitsi kwinjira
allowGuestJoin.description: Emerera abakoresha bitanditswe kwinjira mucyumba nkumushyitsi

isEncrypted.label: Gushoboza encryption-irangira
isEncrypted.description: Iyo bishoboka, ubutumwa mucyumba buzabikwa burundu-kugeza-impera
isEncrypted.alert: Excryption-irangira-irangizwa mucyumba, kandi iyi miterere ntishobora kuzimwa.
